verses.name: Job 32:10
verses.text: Therefore I said, Hearken to me; I also will shew mine opinion.

verses.name: Job 32:11
verses.text: Behold, I waited for your words; I gave ear to your reasons, whilst ye searched out what to say.

verses.name: Job 32:12
verses.text: Yea, I attended unto you, and, behold, there was none of you that convinced Job, or that answered his words:

verses.name: Job 32:13
verses.text: Lest ye should say, We have found out wisdom: God thrusteth him down, not man.

verses.name: Job 32:14
verses.text: Now he hath not directed his words against me: neither will I answer him with your speeches.

verses.name: Job 32:15
verses.text: They were amazed, they answered no more: they left off speaking.
